title: Intro-Lit, Media, & Comm
description: An the introductory course to LMC, this course introduces students to key texts and modes of analysis associated with the study of literature, film, digital media, and communication.

prerequisites: ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
